downloadTitle: Live Meeting 2005 Document: Live Meeting 2005 Deployment Guide
downloadDescription: This guide provides the information you need to plan, understand, and perform a deployment of the Microsoft Office Live Meeting 2005 console in your environment.
detailsSection: This guide provides the information you need to plan, understand, and perform a deployment of the Live Meeting 2005 console in your environment. This guide also includes special instructions and considerations for upgrading to Live Meeting 2005 from previous Live Meeting versions.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office program:
    • Microsoft Office Live Meeting 2005
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the Live Meeting 2005 Deployment Guide.doc on your hard disk to open the document.
Instructions for use:

After you install this download, open the document as you typically would.

To remove this download:

To remove the download file, delete the file Live Meeting 2005 Deployment Guide.doc.
